simplified: 明知山有虎，偏向虎山行
traditional: 明知山有虎，偏向虎山行
pinyin: ming2 zhi1 shan1 you3 hu3 , pian1 xiang4 hu3 shan1 xing2

definitions.ming2 zhi1 shan1 you3 hu3 , pian1 xiang4: lit. to willfully go towards the mountain although knowing that it has tigers (idiom); fig. to take a risk despite knowing the dangers;
